author: Timothy B. Lee
title: At least seven got COVID-19 during Wisconsin’s election, officials say
description: Worker shortages forced Milwaukee to reduce polling places from 180 to five.
content:
Enlarge/ Milwaukee voters wait in line at Riverside High School on April 7, 2020.
